name: Cinnamoroll
description: Cinnamoroll is a small, chubby dog that lives on a cloud far up in the sky together with his family and friends. Though he can be a bit shy, Cinnamoroll is friendly and helps out his friends when they need him. He works at Cafe Cinnamon where he sometimes sleeps on customers’ laps.

name: Azuki
description: Azuki is a member of the Cinnamonangels, known to be calm though sometimes she can be slightly off-tempo by making sharp remarks. She runs a traditional sweets shop called Angelan. Azuki’s dream is to become a true Japanese lady someday.

name: Chiffon
description: Chiffon is an athletic and energetic little puppy that can come up with games for her friends on the spot. Together with Mocha and Azuki, this cutie is part of the idol group Cinnamoangels. Her charm point is her fluffy ears that look a lot like chiffon cake!

name: Mocha
description: The leader of the Cinnamoangels, Mocha is a kind and caring friend. She’s an older sister figure to Cinnamoroll. Fashionable and chatty, Mocha loves talking to customers at Cafe Cinnamon. She dreams of hosting a fashion show of her own someday.

name: Lloromannic
description: This devilish demon duo is formed by Berry, a little boy demon with big ram horns, and Cherry, a girl demon with bat wings and fangs. These two live in an abandoned gothic mansion.

name: Poponen
description: Poponen is an otter from the future and the mascot of SINANEN Akari no Mori Denki. He is the keeper of the Akari no Mori, the Forest of Light, where he met Cinnamoroll.

name: Pompompurin
description: Pompompurin is a good-natured golden retriever who loves spending time with friends. He lives in his own little basket at the entrance of his sister-owner’s house and enjoys collecting shoes.

name: Muffin
description: Muffin is a smart hamster and Pompompurin's best friend. He loves cracking open nuts and storing them in his cheeks. He often hides inside Pompompurin’s beret.

name: Kuromi
description: Kuromi is a cool and cute white rabbit with a black jester's hat. Though a villain, she's very girly and enjoys romantic stories and good food.

name: Baku
description: Baku is Kuromi’s sidekick, a purple boy tapir with the ability to sniff dreams. He’s a chill character who doesn't let things like Kuromi’s teasing affect him.

name: Romina
description: Romina is Kuromi’s older sister, whose true identity is a magical wishing stone. She came to life because of Kuromi’s wish to have a cool, cute, and mysterious older sibling.

name: Pochacco
description: Pochacco is a sporty white dog with black floppy ears. He loves athletic activities and is known for being active, though he often trips.

name: Choppy
description: Choppy is a sweet and kind-hearted mouse who is Pochacco's best friend and always cheers him on during his sporting adventures.

name: Pi-Chans
description: Pi-Chans are a trio of chick sisters named Piyo, Pico, and Peep. They are known for their beautiful three-part chorus and mischievous charm.

name: Hello Kitty
description: Based on a white Japanese bobtail cat, Hello Kitty is one of the biggest icons of the kawaii-sphere. Living in the suburbs of London with Mimmy and the rest of her family, Hello Kitty is a bright, kind-hearted girl. She’s as tall as five apples and weighs as much as three. Hello Kitty is very close to her twin, Mimmy. She’s good at baking, likes to play the piano, and collects cute things.

name: Mimmy
description: Hello Kitty’s twin, Mimmy is a cat that looks a whole lot like her sister with her beautiful white hair. The only difference is that she wears her ribbon on the right side of her ear (Hello Kitty wears it on the left). Unlike her sister who is curious, active, and a tad bit reckless, Mimmy is polite and homely. Sometimes she has to hold Kitty back from doing rash things!

name: Tiny Chum
description: Hello Kitty’s best friend, Tiny Chum can be a bit mischievous. Sometimes he imitates Kitty by wearing a ribbon on his head. He ends up living at Kitty’s house after his father moves to New York for work. Tiny Chum has six siblings with different colors (cafe au lait, pink, light blue, yellow, lilac, and mint green.)

name: Dear Daniel
description: Dear Daniel’s full name is Daniel Starr. This cutie is based on a Japanese male bobtail cat, just like Hello Kitty. Trendy, sensitive, and naive, Dear Daniel is Hello Kitty’s boyfriend.

name: Charmmy Kitty
description: Hello Kitty’s pet cat, Charmmy Kitty is cute, spunky, and friendly. She was named Charmmy since she wears the key to Kitty’s jewelry around her neck. Though she is kind and polite, Charmmy can be sassy at times.

name: My Melody
description: A white rabbit character, My Melody debuted as the kawaii version of Little Red Riding Hood. This honest, good-natured girl is best friends with Hello Kitty. You can also call her by the name My Melo. My Melody lives in the magical forest of Mariland together with all her animal friends! She loves pound cake a lot.

name: Araiguma
description: Araiguma is a yellow raccoon character with black pointy ears, a striped tail, and an orange oval nose. This cutie loves cleanliness and observing things.

name: Flat
description: Flat is a blue mouse and My Melody’s best friend. He’s a bit shy and loves spending time with My Melody. They’re almost always seen hanging out together.

name: Littleforestfellow
description: Also known as Mellow, Littleforestfellow is My Melody’s cousin. He likes collecting buttons, and was given a red hood by My Melody, which he treasures. His catchphrase is “nanodesu,” meaning 'a bit strange' or 'interesting'.

name: My Sweet Piano
description: My Sweet Piano is a soft, girly, and kind sheep character. She loves playing the piano and making flower crowns and necklaces. My Sweet Piano is My Melody’s best friend.

name: Hangyodon
description: Half-fish, half-person, Hangyodon is a nice guy who loves to make people around him laugh. He’s a softie who doesn’t really like to be left alone. Though he’s shy around women, he’s a huge romantic. Hangyodon wants to be a hero someday.

name: Sayuri
description: Sayuri is Hangyodon’s best friend. She’s an optimistic and curious female octopus who loves collecting fans. Her favorite food is dumplings and sour foods made with lots of vinegar. Sayuri is very flexible and can do acrobatic moves.

name: Kiki
description: Kiki is the younger brother of the Little Twin Stars with short blue hair. He loves fishing for stars and inventing things. This cheeky cutie is curious about everything in the world! Before he was given a name, he and his sister Lala were known as the Charmers.

name: Lala
description: Lala is the older sister of the Little Twin Stars. She has long pink hair and can be a bit timid. Lala loves writing poems, drawing, and cooking. She often worries about her younger brother, Kiki, as he tends to get into dangerous situations with his curiosity.

name: Lili
description: Lili is a twin witch girl from the Magical Twin Comets. She wears a ponytail and a purple pendant around her neck. Lili has a boyish and energetic personality. She specializes in spells using moon drops and is childhood friends with Kiki and Lala.

name: Lulu
description: Lulu is the other twin in the Magical Twin Comets. She has twin tails and wears a red pendant. Lulu is talkative, loves fashion, and specializes in spells using star fragments. She is best friends with Lili and the Little Twin Stars.

name: Tuxedosam
description: Tuxedosam is a fashionable young penguin from Tuxedo Island. He’s the older brother of Tam and Pam and loves looking good. Tuxedosam has 365 bow ties and speaks English well, though he can be clumsy and occasionally overeats.

name: Tam
description: Tam is the shy but sweet youngest brother of Tuxedosam. He has a special talent for calming people around him and loves snoozing. Tam is also fond of collecting pajamas.

name: Pam
description: Pam is the energetic younger brother of Tuxedosam. He's always looking for fun and exciting things to do and loves collecting hats. Pam is the life of the party.

name: Badtz-Maru
description: Bad Badtz-Maru is the bad boy of the kawaii world. He has a signature pose where he pulls down one eye and sticks out his tongue. Though mischievous, he has a soft heart and dreams of becoming the boss of everything when he grows up.

name: Hana-Maru
description: Hana-Maru is the opposite of Badtz-Maru and his best friend. He’s a friendly seal who loves ball acrobatics and taking care of flowers. He’s also part of Badtz-Maru’s special XO clan.

name: Tsunko
description: Tsunko is Badtz-Maru’s mischievous younger sister. She enjoys dressing as a nurse and playing pranks, even though she’s younger than her brother. Tsunko loves ballet and strikes poses whenever she speaks.

name: Cogimyun
description: Cogimyun is a cute wheat flour fairy, also known as a Cogimuna. She is sensitive and easily falls apart. Cogimyun dreams of becoming an onigiri rice ball because it’s her grandpa’s favorite food. She is accompanied by her pet, Ebifurai.

name: Ebifurai
description: Ebifurai is Cogimyun’s pet, a fried shrimp, also known as Ebi-chan. Though they argue at times, Ebifurai is supportive of Cogimyun and was found in the forest by her when she was young.

name: Keroppi
description: Keroppi, also known as Kero Kero Keroppi, is a small frog from Donut Pond. He's extremely optimistic, loves to swim, and has a bubbly personality. His mouth is typically seen in a V-shape when closed.

name: Den Den
description: Den Den is a trusty snail and Keroppi's best friend. He is often seen tagging along with Keroppi, even if he’s a little slower.

name: Gudetama
description: Gudetama is the lazy egg who loves soy sauce and being left alone. His name is a blend of 'gude gude' (meaning sluggish) and 'tamago' (meaning egg). He’s known for his apathetic attitude and laid-back personality.

name: Hardboiled
description: Hardboiled is another egg character like Gudetama but with thick, menacing eyebrows. He was created after being boiled for more than 15 minutes, which might explain his jaded attitude.

name: PiHai
description: PiHai is a black fox who loves mangoes, apples, and grapes. He’s a member of Jochum and dreams of becoming a pilot. His charm point is his baggy clothes! When he’s not sticking out his tongue, PiHai seems to have an expressionless face. He represents JO1 member Sukai Kinjo.

name: Rain
description: Rain is a blue fox born on March 2, who is a magician with dreams of surprising people with his magic. He’s PiHai’s older brother in Jochum. His luscious blue coat is his charm point, and his favorite color is blue. He represents JO1 member Ren Kawashiri.

name: Miken
description: Miken is a light blue microphone character from Jochum. Unlike Rain and PiHai, Miken isn’t an animal. His dream is to make everyone happy with a song that everyone can sing together. He loves long walks, eating out, sleeping, and singing. Miken represents Junki Kono from JO1.

name: Chimata
description: Chimata is a purple rabbit with a fluffy white tail, representing Syoya Kimata from JO1. His charm point is his sparkly purple eyes. He loves sushi so much that his dream is to eat all the sushi in the world. Chimata also loves playing games and often wears black headphones.

name: Yunakami
description: Yunakami is a green dragon with a purple tail, representing Sho Yonashiro from JO1. His dream is to be a guardian deity and he loves staying at home to protect the house. His favorite colors are green and orange, and he enjoys snacks like chocolate chip cookies and sata andagi.

name: Mamechi
description: Mamechi is a tan corgi representing Mamehara Issie from JO1. He admires heroes and dreams of becoming one. Mamechi enjoys motorcycle touring, nature, and fighting to protect people’s smiles.

name: Popoh
description: Popoh is a pink penguin with a strawberry on its head! He’s easygoing and loves to sleep and eat, especially ice cream in strawberry, chocolate, and mint flavors. Popoh’s catchphrase is “Yappo!” and he represents Takumi Kawanishi from JO1.

name: Chulala
description: Chulala is a gray chihuahua with a purple octopus hat that can shoot lasers. He loves traveling space and dreams of invading it. Chulala’s favorite color is the darkest shade of black, and he represents Shion Tsurubo from JO1.

name: Moco
description: Moco is an angel, unlike the other Jochum members who are animals. He represents Shosei Ohira from JO1. Moco’s favorite place is above the clouds and his dream is to make everyone in the world happy. He just wants to make people feel better!

name: Ruru
description: Ruru is a fluffy white dog with a crown on its head, representing Ruki Shirowa from JO1. He loves desserts like crepes, daigaku, and parfaits and can sleep anywhere as long as he has his pacifier.

name: Bira
description: Bira is a bright sunflower with red lips in the shape of a heart. He enjoys sunny weather and sunshine, and his charm point is his flower petals. Bira represents Keigo Sato from JO1.

name: Landlord
description: Landlord is the name given to the cutie who manages the house where the Jochum gang resides. Not much is known about their personal life, but they are an important part of the Jochum family.

name: Wish Me Mell
description: Wish Me Mell is a clumsy but kind rabbit who helps deliver mail around Merci Hills. She loves collecting stamps and writing letters. Mell was created to represent kind phrases like 'I like you' and 'Thank you.' She was designed for young women who are too shy to express their feelings.

name: Mai Mai
description: Mai Mai is a gentle pink puppy who represents the Japanese pop singer Mai Kuraki. Like the singer, Mai Mai expresses her feelings through songs that cheer people up. She loves playing the piano and her favorite food is watermelon.

name: Ahiru no Pekkle
description: Pekkle is a white duck with orange legs, known for his love of tap dancing and taking dance lessons. He’s a gentle and kind-hearted boy and plays the keyboard in the Hapidanbui.

name: Pitch
description: Pitch is a fish who is good friends with Pekkle and even teaches him how to swim. His biggest dream is to live outside the water and roam on land.

name: Ran
description: Ran is a small but ambitious fish who dreams of becoming a model. She is Pekkle’s best friend and shares the same birthday as Pitch and Chap.

name: Chap
description: Chap is a fish who shares the same birthday as Pitch and Ran. He dreams of becoming a professional surfer. He is another of Pekkle’s fish friends.

name: Kirimichan
description: Kirimichan is based on a slice of salmon who dreams of being part of a delicious meal. She was born when someone sliced a piece of fish on August 31st. Kirimichan’s closest friend is Kamaboko-chan.

name: Kamaboko-chan
description: Kamaboko-chan is based on cured surimi, a Japanese processed seafood product. She is a bit clumsy but caring and loves having girl talks. She is one of Kirimichan’s closest friends.

name: Takuwanwan
description: Takuwanwan is Kirimichan’s pet, whom she rescued from the Takuwanwan protection facility. Takuwanwan wasn’t close to Kirimichan at first, but now they are very attached.

name: Ichigo-chan with Condensed Milk
description: Ichigo-chan was born when condensed milk was poured over a strawberry. She works hard every day to promote happiness, always reflecting her favorite's emotions.

name: Magurokun
description: Maguro-kun is a stylish tuna who wears a wasabi hat and loves traveling the world. He often shares stories of his adventures with Kirimichan.

name: Cyan
description: Cyan is the main heroine of *Show by Rock!!*, a member of the band Plasmagica. She has a straightforward but gentle personality and loves Gothic Lolita fashion.

name: ChuChu
description: ChuChu is the charismatic leader of Plasmagica and the main vocalist. Though she secretly dreams of being a solo artist, she enjoys being with her bandmates.

name: Retoree
description: Retoree is the bassist and vocalist of Plasmagica. She has a cool and cold exterior but is more complex than she appears. Her bass is called 'Blue Station.

name: Moa
description: Moa is the drummer and vocalist of Plasmagica, often juggling her band responsibilities with her job at a bedding store. Her drums are called 'Super Cosmos.'

name: Crow
description: Crow is the lead vocalist and guitarist of ShinganCrimsonZ. He comes from a family of dairy farmers and is defensive about his background. His guitar is called 'Red Tomahawk.

name: Yaiba
description: Yaiba plays bass for ShinganCrimsonZ and has a deep respect for the soul of rock and Bushido. His bass, 'Ryukenden,' is shaped like a katana.

name: Rom
description: Rom is the drummer of ShinganCrimsonZ and the band's leader. He is hot-blooded and proud of his physique, often showing it off in front of his bandmates.

name: Moppu
description: Moppu is a polar bear cub who loves to laze around at home, always draped in his favorite blanket. He’s a homebody who lives with a girl roommate who works at an aquarium. Moppu’s name comes from the way he drags his blanket around like mopping the floor.

name: Gyoniku
description: Gyoniku is a stuffed fish plushie given to Moppu by his roommate. It has a mysterious antenna on its head, and Moppu isn’t sure what kind of fish it is. Gyoniku is known for living at its own pace.

name: Kanikama
description: Kanikama is a stuffed crab, a reliable and calm character in the Marumofubiyori group. She was given to Moppu by his girl roommate. Sometimes, she’s scared of the future, but she’s always there for Moppu.

name: Ruby
description: Ruby is a polite and clean Jewelpet who loves cherry blossom season. She’s the mascot of the Jewelpet franchise and her gem name is Kogyuko.

name: Garnet
description: Garnet is a hardworking Jewelpet who takes great pride in his beautiful coat. His gem name is the same as his real name. He is one of the three mascots of the Jewelpet franchise.

name: Safi
description: Safi is a quiet and understated Jewelpet with the gem name Sapphire. She loves spending time by windows, looking out into the world. She is one of the three mascots of the Jewelpet franchise.

name: Labra
description: Labra is a baby Jewelpet also known by the name Labradorite. Although it can't use magic well yet, Labra might have a great power hiding inside it.

name: Call
description: Call is a Jewelpet known for its patience and perseverance, never giving up even when it fails. Its gem name is Coal, and it loves nibbling on leaves in grasslands or near water.

name: Granite
description: Granite is a calm and gentle Jewelpet who loves to spend time in trees. His gem name is also Granite, and he’s a perfectionist who doesn't like showing any weakness.

name: Rua
description: Rua is a bright and positive Jewelpet with many talents, including playing piano, dancing, and singing. Her gem name is Blue Apatite.

name: Jasper
description: Jasper is a quiet Jewelpet who, despite his cool exterior, is very kind and smart. His gem name is also Jasper.

name: Shirousa
description: Shirousa is a white bunny and one of the two main characters of the Sugarbunnies universe. He is the twin brother of Kurousa, and together they are skilled patissiers who make sweets.

name: Kurousa
description: Kurousa is a brown bunny and the twin brother of Shirousa. Like his brother, he specializes in making pastries, especially cream cakes. They live in Bunniesfield and make sweets together.

name: Momousa
description: Momousa is a florist bunny and the older twin sister of Hanausa. She has an excellent sense of flower arrangement and loves working with flowers.

name: Hanausa
description: Hanausa is a florist bunny and the younger twin sister of Momousa. She has a deep bond with flowers and is great friends with them.

name: Strawberryusa
description: Strawberryusa is a rabbit who works as a jam maker. She’s skilled at growing fruits, especially strawberries, and she loves creating sweet treats.

name: Blueberryusa
description: Blueberryusa is the twin of Strawberryusa and also works as a jam maker. She is a talented cook and loves hosting parties.

name: Shinta
description: Shinta is a bright and lively boy with red hair and blue eyes. He stands out at the nursery for his energetic and gentle nature. Honest and cute, Shinta often wears a white shirt with black shorts.

name: Hikaru
description: Hikaru is a responsible and fair young girl, loved by everyone in the nursery. She is seen as an older sister figure and can be sweet towards her childhood best friend, Maria.

name: Daigoro
description: Daigoro is an energetic young boy with orange hair and green eyes. He brings happiness to everyone around him with his cheerful spirit. He loves to exercise and gets hungry easily.

name: Kanata
description: Kanata has yellow hair with blue highlights and enjoys wearing a blue-gray jacket and gray shorts. Though he can be a bit naughty, he seeks attention and always carries his plushie, Hinata, around.

name: Hayate
description: Hayate is an independent boy who tends to keep his distance from others. Despite his tough exterior, he’s insightful and thoughtful. He has gray hair, pink eyes, and often wears a black mask and purple jacket.

name: Yuu Okada
description: Yuu Okada is the male teacher of the nursery. Though kind and bright, he lacks experience and can be indecisive, making him appear unreliable at times. Yuu strives to build good relationships with the children.

name: Rumi-sensei
description: Rumi is a strong, dependable senior teacher at the nursery. She’s well-liked by students, parents, and coworkers alike. Calm and collected, Rumi is always there to help the children stay calm.

name: Nya
description: Nya is the most mature and solid of the five kittens in the Nya Ni Nyu Ne Nyon family. He’s a cheeky and confident little kitty who often takes charge.

name: Nyu
description: Nyu, though the youngest of the kittens, acts like a bit of a baby. He’s always craving milk and is the most adorable of the bunch.

name: Ne
description: Ne is the fashionable and trendy kitten of the group. With a precocious personality, she always stands out with her stylish looks and adventurous spirit.

name: Nyon
description: Nyon is the troublemaker of the group, always stirring up mischief and making things more interesting. Despite his naughty nature, he’s lovable and full of energy.

name: Retsuko
description: Retsuko is a red panda working in the accounting department of a trading company. She’s an introvert with social anxiety, and she vents her frustrations by singing death metal at karaoke.

name: Washimi
description: Washimi is a beautiful secretary bird who works as the secretary to the company president. She’s highly skilled and perceptive but can become frustrated with the president’s shortcomings.

name: Director Ton
description: Director Ton is Retsuko’s supervisor and a cantankerous pig. He holds traditional beliefs about gender roles and often bullies Retsuko for her quiet nature.

name: Feneko
description: Feneko is a fennec fox working in the same department as Retsuko. Unlike Retsuko, she’s more adept at managing work and personal life, though she shares many of the same complaints about their boss.

name: Haida
description: Haida is a hyena who works in the same department as Retsuko. He’s interested in her but struggles to connect with her due to her low self-confidence. He’s often teased by Feneko about his crush.

name: Tadano-kun
description: Tadano is an IT genius and president who believes in using AI to improve efficiency. He’s a bit rough around the edges, making it hard for others to understand his softer side, especially Retsuko.

name: Resasuke
description: Resasuke is a mysterious red panda who moves at his own pace and enjoys plants. Though initially attractive, Retsuko soon realizes he’s not as perfect as he seemed.

name: Chum
description: Chum is a fun-loving bunny who loves baking cakes, cookies, and having parties. She’s friendly but often feels lonely.

name: Pam
description: Pam is a dependable leader and a gentle but strong elephant boy. He’s friends with Chum and often supports her in her endeavors.

name: Myu
description: Myu is a mischievous cat who loves to play outside. He’s cute and hard to hate, but he often causes trouble for others.

name: Muu
description: Mu is a knowledgeable and studious bear boy who is fashionable and listens to others’ concerns. He’s thoughtful and always ready to help.

name: Chuu
description: Chuu is a spoiled and clumsy little mouse who can’t calm down unless Chum is around to help him. He’s a bit of a handful but still lovable.

name: Okuba
description: Okuba is a hard-working and humble back molar tooth. Often feeling overlooked, Okuba takes pride in his work and is always trying his best.

name: Ohaguro
description: Ohaguro is a polite and mysterious tooth who only appears after eating dark food. He’s wise and always gives good advice.

name: Deppa
description: Deppa is a tooth with a Kansai dialect. He’s a moodmaker who enjoys using humor and often freezes others with his sharp remarks.

name: Yaeba
description: Yaeba is a firm and fashionable businesswoman tooth who wears red lipstick. She has a bright smile but struggles with self-esteem due to her double teeth.

name: Kinba
description: Kinba is a gold tooth who’s wealthy and financially savvy. He’s a powerful and flexible leader in the Hagurumanstyle group.

name: Ginba
description: Ginba is a silver tooth with high tension and a desire to stand out. He’s stoic and loyal but often suffers from anxiety.

name: Zonbiba
description: Zonbiba is a callous zombie tooth. Though he seems insensitive, his resilience and ease with life make him a lovable member of the group.

name: Implant
description: Implant is a high-tech, handsome tooth with a dazzling aura. Though he seems perfect, he’s struggling with emptiness and a lack of fulfillment.

name: Plaque Teeth
description: Plaque Teeth is a dual-personality tooth who’s calculating and manipulative, using his cuteness to control others.

name: Kenshiro
description: Kenshiro is a canine tooth (pet dog tooth). He’s tough and dependable, always looking out for others.

name: Kibanyan
description: Kibanyan is a zombie tooth cat with a sweet and mischievous personality.

name: Peko
description: Peko is a chatty, playful kitten with a big love for food. He’s a key member of the Mewkledreamy group and loves to entertain.

name: Suu
description: Suu is a reliable and kind kitten who helps others with her abilities. She can detect Black Abysses and rewind time.

name: Rei
description: Rei is a tough, cool kitten who refers to himself as a prince. He has a royal air about him and is very charming.

name: Chia
description: Chia is a sweet, cuddly baby kitten who is the princess of Miracle Dreamy Kingdom. She has a magical flower inside her heart.

name: Yuni
description: Yuni is a prankster kitten who can be clumsy, but cares deeply for Tsugi and Hagi. He created them out of loneliness.

name: Tsugi
description: Tsugi is a two-piece kitten created by Yuni. She’s sweet and loves Yuni very much.

name: Mia
description: A pink cat that wears a large, black bow, Mia loves observing girls whose hearts are pounding with wild ideas. Her ears and her hot-and-cold personality are what makes Mia interesting. She loves sweet things, especially strawberry-flavored chocolate. Mia also loves romcoms. When she transforms into her vampire state, she gets wings on her back and the tips of her ears, paws, and tail become grey. Her pupils also get slimmer!

name: Chelsea
description: Chelsea is a light blue stripped cat with a clear, whispery voice. Though her comments can be harsh, they always come from a good place of friendship. This cat is always sleepy! She enjoys Vocaloid music and electronics. In her vampire form, Chelsea gains wings and the tips of her ears, and the stripes on her body become dark grey.

name: Rico
description: A yellow zombie cat with patches and a frazzled lion tail, Rico is a member of Beatcats that’s full of energy and tension. Her tongue tends to hang out of her mouth! Rico is an agile dancer - she loves running and exercising. When she turns into a vampire like Mia and Chelsea she gets wings on her back and the stitched parts of her body become dark grey. This cutie loves eating meat like a lion!

name: Layla
description: Always wearing her headphones on, Layla is a purple cat with a sharklike patch going down her face. She has an expression that doesn’t change that much even though she’s always paying attention to the things going on around her. Layla livens up the Beatcats performance with her rap! When she transforms into her vampire form she gets wings on her back and parts of her body become grey. Her pupils also get slimmer like Mia.

name: Emma
description: Gentle and kind, Emma is a fluffy-mint green cat with bows on her head. She’s a bit of an airhead, though she’s not entirely convinced that she is one. A flexible kitty, Emma can dance gracefully. In her vampire form, this cat gets wings on her back and the tips of ears, paws, and tail turn grey. She loves mint chocolate chip ice cream and nice, long baths.

name: Lip
description: Lip is a pink tulip Fairilu who cries easily but has a kind heart and does not give up. She is in love with Drop, Nozomu’s Fairilu form. She struggled to open the Door of Birth but was encouraged by Nozomu. She always thinks of him.

name: Himawari
description: Himawari is a sunflower Fairilu who is innocent and cheerful. She is good at dancing and is very popular with everyone for her shining bright personality.

name: Sumire
description: Sumire is a violet Fairilu who is good at painting and likes beautiful things. Extremely sensitive, her dream is to be a fashion designer.

name: Rose
description: Rose is a red rose Fairilu who is hard-working and proud. She first saw Lip as her rival, but through Lip’s efforts, she learned to get along with others. She is good at hair styling and cosmetic blending but is also a bit clumsy.

name: Rin
description: Rin is a carefree and sweet purple Fairilu born one year later than the other Fairilus. She likes making perfumes and hopes to create perfumes that can help people’s feelings.

name: Ichigoman
description: Ichigoman is the alter ego of Hello Kitty, a superhero that fights monsters created by humans with wicked, unhappy hearts. She was born when Kitty White stumbled on an ancient picture book and was transformed into Ichigoman after raising the strawberry-shaped smartphone.

name: Dark Grape Man
description: Dark Grape Man is Ichigoman’s partner in crime. Known for his signature line 'Martial Artist of Justice! Dark Grape Man!' he attacks his enemies and uses a secret weapon in his sidecar.

name: Honeymomo
description: A peach-inspired cat hero, Honeymomo is Dark Grape Man’s sexy secretary. Though she seems cute and unassuming, Honeymomo is a martial arts expert who can surpass both Dark Grape Man and Ichigoman.

name: Sakura
description: A curious and positive bunny Bosamaru who loves helping others. She lives with her grandma and always says 'Let's try it!' no matter how difficult the task. She's easily swayed by others and cares deeply for people.

name: Kathy
description: A veteran stray cat Bosamaru. Kathy is calm and lazy at work. She stays around Sakura's house and enjoys lazing around, moving at her own pace.

name: Ran
description: A clean and knowledgeable hamster Bosamaru who lives next to Sakura's house. She is easygoing but impatient, often being bullied by dogs. She has experience with human culture and is very knowledgeable.

name: Alfredaloha
description: A posh elephant who likes wearing shirts, hats, and sunglasses. His color can be either yellow or brown.

name: Chelsea Stripes
description: A pair of fairies who wear striped clothing and pointy hats. They appear at twilight on Chelsea Street.

name: Fancy Elephant
description: A fancy elephant character made for the Fancy Friends line.

name: Funnybones
description: A dog character with a polka dot ribbon around its neck, created as part of the Fancy Friends lineup.

name: Hanatousagi
description: A rabbit character whose name means 'flowers and rabbits' in Japanese.

name: Hopty Copty
description: A colorful and cheerful helicopter boy.,Not provided,Sanrio,Helicopter

name: House Train
description: A unique character that is both a house and a train, running freely through the world of dreams.

name: Howdy (Kidsbear)
description: Howdy (ハウディ, Haudi), also known as KIDSBEAR (キッズベア), is a yellow bear character from the Japanese company Sanrio. With tiny little eyes filled with kindness and his signature bright red bow tie, Howdy has the unique talent of warming the hearts of those around him. He's seen either with or without a mouth, and has even been seen with brown fur instead of yellow.

name: Kamome
description: A seagull character designed for Fancy Friends.

name: Hummingmint
description: A female fawn character, Hummingmint was born in the beautiful mint-green northern night. A curious and gentle creature, she loves to sing. Hummingmint lives in the forest with the birds and the flowers. She has a pink, heart-shaped nose.

name: Monsieur Marin
description: A European art-inspired male character created for the Fancy Friends lineup.

name: Playin' Paradise
description: A group of characters consisting of a rabbit, dog, and cat, created for the Fancy Friends lineup.

name: Little Train
description: A cute retro design of a train character created for Fancy Friends.

name: The Mainstream
description: A group of characters consisting of a boy rabbit, a boy bear, and a girl cat, made for the Fancy Friends brand.

name: Toby Trix
description: A white animal with pointy ears, resembling a fox, created for the Fancy Friends lineup.

name: Winkipinki
description: A fashionable and romantic cat character from Sanrio's Fancy Friends lineup.

name: Zou Jitensha
description: An elephant character created for Fancy Friends, whose name translates to 'Elephant Bicycle'.

name: Adorozatorumary
description: Adorozatorumary is a cat-like cutie created in collaboration with Japanese singer Ado. She was born from an egg and has an insatiable appetite for everything, including things like paper, flowers, and even metal!

name: Arie
description: Arie is an orange cat-like character from Sanrio English Master. He loves kiwi and curry but isn’t very athletic. Despite his cool persona, he struggles with sports.

name: Atchan ga Ichiban!
description: Atchan is a curious baby character who loves adventure. He can talk to trees, flowers, and animals in baby talk. His real name is a secret, and he can be mischievous at times.

name: Ayankey
description: Ayankey is a pink monkey born out of collaboration between Sanrio and actress Aya Matsura. She has heart beads on her tail and was created to keep Aya company when she feels lonely.

name: Beetroid
description: Beetroid is a group of insectoid androids designed to understand human language. They aim to create a world where humans and insects can coexist peacefully.

name: Benjaminbear
description: Benjaminbear is a teddy bear who loves cooking and traveling. Born in the Charlotte Forest, he's an independent bear who always helps his friends in need.

name: Bestfriend's Story
description: Bestfriend's Story follows a mouse family living in a lonely hotel in the cold north. The story is set in a remote countryside where the mice embark on adventures.

name: B. Hills Kid
description: B. Hills Kid, also known as Philip Allen, is a smart and independent dog from Beverly Hills. His parents are busy, so he often stays home alone.

name: Billy Pie
description: Billy Pie is a white bear with a mysterious hat. This retro character debuted in 1981 and is known for its unique charm and whimsical nature.

name: Big Challenge
description: Big Challenge is a goofy crocodile character who is always smiling. He first appeared in 1978 but didn't gain prominence until 45 years later in the Hello Kitty Island Adventure game.

name: Bogo the City Boy
description: Bogo is a city boy, likely a gorilla, who loves music and stays up to date with the latest trends. He is a true urban character.

name: Boo Gey Woo
description: Boo Gey Woo is a group of three pig siblings who want to open a restaurant along a national highway. Boo is the head cook, Gey loves croquettes, and Woo is the caring eldest daughter.

name: Boo Gie Boo
description: Boo Gie Boo is a naughty white dog who loves adventures and wears a blue hat. This retro character debuted in 1978.

name: Bonbonribbon
description: Bonbonribbon is a fashionable pink rabbit who dreams of becoming a fashion designer, just like her mother. She is known for the ribbon on her head, which is her charm point.

name: Boy & Girl
description: Boy & Girl are simple characters dressed in plain blue and red clothes. They are best friends who bring happiness to everyone they meet.

name: Brownies' Story
description: Living in a cute animal village, the Brownies’ Story is a group of three close friends born on the night of the Spring Moon Festival. They are only children. Penny is a chicken with a laidback and easygoing personality. She grows veggies and plays the accordion. Jingle the dog is romantic and good-natured. He loves going on walks and taking time fishing. Rex, the fox, is the last member of the group. He’s fast-paced, strong-willed, and inventive.  The group made its debut in 1986.

name: Bubble Cheeks
description: Bubble Cheeks is a group of three characters—a rabbit, a bear, and a mouse—who live in Peppermint Village, where there’s always something interesting happening.

name: Devilmintkiryu
description: This petite girl comes from the Devilmint Kiryu tribe. Living alone in an old apartment, Devilmint Kiryu is great at detailed work and games that require concentration. She cooks for herself and is confident in her skills at frying eggs. This cutie can shoot beans from her horns.

name: DinDonDanny
description: A group of three energetic brothers, DinDonDanny always gets along pretty well. It’s named that way because the bear brothers' names are Din, Don, and Danny! Put together it is DinDonDanny.

name: Dokidoki Yummychums
description: Dokidoki Yummychums is a cute burger character from Sanrio. Sometimes you see it with its friend, Dokidoki fries.

name: Donjarahoi
description: Donjarahoi is a group of animal characters that include a cow, a raccoon, a fox, a wild boar, a goat, and a mouse. The name of the group translates to 'longevity' in English. Each member of the group loves festivals and has different skills they show off during the festival season.
species: Animals including Cow, Raccoon, Fox, Mouse, Wild Boar, Goat

name: Dopey Demons
description: A pair of silly characters, the Dopey Demons are mixed bunnies like Kuromi. They enjoy wearing demon-like costumes, that’s why they’re called Dopey Demons. Not only that, but they’re a bit clumsy and filled with mischief. Coming to Earth on a cloud from outer space, these two have a knack for dark jokes.

name: Dreamtale Kubear
description: A sweet duck character, Duckadoo is always wearing a straw hat. This mature duck has a shy personality with a quaint country style. People seem to like that about her. She’s also very fashionable.

name: Fairy Charmer
description: Fairy Charmer is a girl flower fairy with a pure heart. She brings happiness to everyone!

name: Fragaria Memories
description: A multimedia fantasy project by Sanrio, Fragaria Memories showcases a number of unique anime characters and kingdoms.

name: Framboiloulou
description: Framboiloulou is made up of a little girl named Lulu and her big teddy bear named Fram. They were created for older girls and women who love romance. Lulu is a five-year-old girl who lives with Fram, a raspberry-colored bear she found in Paris.

name: Frooliemew
description: A girl cat with fluffy pink fur, Frooliemew loves cute things. She likes hearts, checks, and ribbons! This cutie was made by Sanrio in 2004.

name: Fresh Punch
description: Fresh Punch isn’t a character but a Sanrio design collection that debuted in 1981. It features candy, lipstick, and other items. It is somehow considered a character in the Sanrio universe.

name: Fukuchan
description: Fukuchan is the mascot dog of the Japanese drug store 'Kusuri no Fukutaro.' He’s a cute dog who loves soccer, football, and art. His trademark is a blue and white striped shirt.

name: Fun Come Alive
description: Fun Come Alive is a group of stylish sports-loving bears who attend the Los Angeles Bear Academy. They are known for their Ivy League fashion.

name: Fuwaranpukaran
description: Fuwaranpukaran is a white creature with a long tail that changes color depending on their mood. They float around like a balloon and are accompanied by a small bird named Tori.

name: Fuzzie's Family
description: Fuzzie’s Family is made of a paper bear and its cub. They are very close and debuted in 1987.

name: Kumamilen
description: Kumamilen is a group of alien bears from the planet Bearth. The main character, Guu, is an orange bear who loves eating and is lazy. He enjoys honey-filled pancakes and is often seen with UFB, a mysterious floating entity.

name: Landry
description: Landry is a raccoon who lives in a wash basin and loves to wash things. He is cheeky and loves eating. He made his debut in 1990.

name: Laughing Woman
description: A mysterious girl who makes everyone around her happy with her bright smile. She suddenly appears with a loud 'hahahaha' laugh.

name: Leosuke
description: Leosuke is a lion with a beautiful violet mane, created by enka singer Leon Niihama. Leosuke's popularity increased in 2023 when he ranked 84th in the Sanrio ranking.

name: Les Nonours
description: Les Nonours are a group of dancing teddy bears from Sanrio. The name means 'stuffed bears' in French, and their skill at dancing steals the spotlight.

name: Little Cottonwood Cottage
description: A group of elf-like characters who live in the woods of Cottonwood Field. Each character has a unique talent such as music, talking to animals, or making instruments.

name: Little Lovin
description: A boy dog with brown fur and droopy black ears. Littlelovin loves eating ogura toast and wears a white hat.

name: Lookyloo
description: Lookyloo is a giraffe with a silly face, known for her vivid colors and simple patterns. Often, only her neck and head are visible.

name: Loveedays
description: A duo of a cat and a mouse who get along wonderfully. They are known for their heartwarming friendship.

name: Puchipuchi Wanko
description: A tiny, tiny dog boy, Puchipuchi Wanko is the same size as 3 strawberries. Born on a strawberry farm, he was accidentally shipped out while snacking on berries. He's on an adventure to get back to his hometown farm.

name: Pukapuka Paradise
description: Pukapuka is a mischievous sea creature that may be an octopus or jellyfish. Sometimes it gets electrocuted by jellyfish and almost dies.

name: Puppie Luv
description: An animal group made up of a rabbit (Stylish Rabbit), a dog (Gentleman Dog), a cat (Smarty Cat), and a bear (Sporty Girlfriend Bear). Each character has a distinct personality.

name: Puripuriunpies
description: The Puripuriunpies is a group of 4 'unpi nymphs' aspiring to be like Hello Kitty. The group consists of Moririn (ice cream-shaped), Hyororon (blue fairy), Kororon (yellow fairy), and Yururun (orange fairy).

name: Pururun Kyupi
description: Pururun Kyupi is a white water fairy that can only be seen by people with beautiful hearts. Kyupi enjoys fortune-telling and can make everyone happy with her presence.

name: Puwawa
description: A yellow Umibozu from old Japanese folklore, Puwawa is genderless and gets along with all living things. Born on a full moon night, it enjoys collecting shells.

name: Qui-Quaks
description: A group of ducks resembling Huey, Dewey, and Louie from Disney, Qui-Quaks includes a mischievous dad and a female duck named Queenie-chan.

name: Risuru
description: A brown squirrel character created in 2003. Risuru has managed to remain relevant and was ranked 78th in Sanrio's 2023 ranking.

name: Robby Rabbit
description: A clumsy but hardworking rabbit who is not good at jumping. Robby loves motorcycles and skateboards and is a third-grade student at the Harevill School in Rabbit Town.

name: Robearta
description: A prima ballerina girl bear who has a boyish side. She loves ballet but also enjoys activities considered more masculine.

name: Wee marylou
description: An adorable little girl with a big ribbon on her back, Wee Marylou loves ribbons. Her room is filled with ribbons that she treasures. One day, a ribbon fairy floated over to give her a ribbon as a gift for being kind. Ever since then, the two have been such good friends!

name: Whiskers & Paw
description: A group of animal characters from Sanrio, Whiskers & Paws made its debut in 1996. It includes cats, dogs, bears, rabbits, dolphins, and even penguins.

name: Kappa no Kappy
description: Kappa no Kappy is a Sanrio character based on a kappa, a mythical water creature from Japan. It loves nature and wears a backpack! This creature loves cucumbers so much that it can even make cucumber ribs! It has many mysterious friends like the flower girl Rinrin and the Otamacopter.

name: Winning Jack
description: This pair of characters is made up of a dog named Jack and a chicken named Nugget. According to Sanrio, these two are dreamy and fun characters who appear to have come right out of a fairytale!

name: Yachiyo Charmer
description: This character is an elegant Japanese girl with a short bob wearing a kimono.

name: Yoshikitty
description: A girl cat based off Yoshiki Hayashi, the leader of the popular visual kei band, X Japan. She specializes in rock-themed items. This cutie was created by one of the designers of Hello Kitty, Yuko Yamaguchi. At one time, in 2018, Yoshikitty was voted more popular than Hello Kitty herself in the Sanrio Character Ranking.

name: Youkai Kids
description: This is a group of second generation of monsters that appear in the summer. It includes Drumsuko, the son of Baron Dracula. There's also Muiragon the mummy, Majorine the witch, Shiranken the laid-back boy, Ooolong the dragon, Oomori, the information broker, Kappei the kappa, and a whole lot more.

name: Yutakun
description: A ghost who loves watermelon and hates the cold, Yutakun thinks his transparent body is his charm point. This ghost worries about not being impressive at all because he always sleeps and relaxes until noon.

name: Zashikubuta
description: Zashikubuta is a Sanrio pig that’s curious and laid back at the same time. Like most pigs, he loves to eat. This character spends most of his days making foods like sweets. He also likes growing vegetables together with his mouse friend, Tabby.

name: Zippyzoo
description: The Zippyzoo is a group of colorful animal characters. They love to run together!
